name: bet Cnc
scenarioDescription:
The bet Cnc Exoplanetary System


Overview

bet Cnc is a star with 1.7 times the mass of the Sun, and 47.2 times its radius. It is located 295.30 light years away from the solar system and is estimated to be 1.85 billion years old, as compared to the Sun which is roughly 4.6 billion years old.

bet Cnc is known to have 1 exoplanets in orbit around it.


Exoplanets in the bet Cnc system


bet Cnc b

bet Cnc b was discovered by the Bohyunsan Optical Astronomical Observatory observatory using the radial velocity method. Its semi-major axis is 1.70 astronomical units, as compared to Earth's which is 1 astronomical unit. The mass of bet Cnc b is 2480.4 times the mass of Earth. At more than 50 Earth masses, bet Cnc b is a gas giant, a planet whose mass is mostly made up of hydrogen and helium, like Jupiter and Saturn in our solar system.
description: 3D visualisation and gravity simulation of the exoplanet system bet Cnc, which contains 1 planets and was discovered by Bohyunsan Optical Astronomical Observatory.
